org.numenta.nupic.util

Class AbstractFlatMatrix<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.util.AbstractFlatMatrix<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - element type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, FlatMatrix<T>, Matrix<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSparseMatrix, BitSetMatrix, FlatArrayMatrix

    public abstract class AbstractFlatMatrix<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements FlatMatrix<T>, java.io.Serializable
    Base class for flat Matrix implementations.
    Author:
    David Ray, Jose Luis Martin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractFlatMatrix

        public AbstractFlatMatrix(int[] dimensions)
        Constructs a new AbstractFlatMatrix object to be configured with specified dimensions and major ordering.
        Parameters:
        dimensions - the dimensions of this matrix

      • AbstractFlatMatrix

        public AbstractFlatMatrix(int[] dimensions,
                          boolean useColumnMajorOrdering)
        Constructs a new AbstractFlatMatrix object to be configured with specified dimensions and major ordering.
        Parameters:
        dimensions - the dimensions of this sparse array
        useColumnMajorOrdering - flag indicating whether to use column ordering or row major ordering. if false (the default), then row major ordering will be used. If true, then column major ordering will be used.
